alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 145 PM EDT... At 1254 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Park, or near Hallandale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Dania Beach, Sunny Isles Beach, West Park, Ravenswood Estates, St. George, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport and Chambers Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
